parameters.description: The ID of the `Product` to which the `Modifier` belongs.
parameters.name: product_id

display_name.description: The name of the option shown on the storefront.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the modifier; increments sequentially.

name.description: The unique option name. Auto-generated from the display name, a timestamp, and the product ID.

product_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the product to which the option belongs.

required.description: Whether or not this modifer is required at checkout.

type.description:
The type of modifier, which determines how it will display on the storefront. For reference, the former v2 API values are:
D = date, C = checkbox, F = file, T = text, MT = multi_line_text, N = numbers_only_text, RB = radio_buttons,
RT = rectangles, S = dropdown, P = product_list, PI = product_list_with_images, CS = swatch.

422.description: The `Modifier` was not valid. This is the result of missing required fields, or of invalid data. See the response for more details.
